General.Name: Janfusun Fancyworld
General.Description: Janfusun Fancyworld Corp. operates theme parks and hotels in Taiwan. It also offers management and business administration consulting, horticultural, landscaping, interior design, etc. services. In addition, the company produces animated motion pictures; and operates forest recreation area. Janfusun Fancyworld Corp. was founded in 1986 and is based in Yunlin, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Mei-Cao  Lin
2.Title: Deputy GM of Accounting Department & Accounting Supervisor
